languages.text: {n}Звон в ушах оглушает вас на мгновение. Вы моргаете — и секунда тянется дольше декады лет. Волнующий обольстительный {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}шепот{/d} щекочет мозг изнутри:{/n} "Как интересно... Праведные убийцы, считающие себя орудием высшей воли, блуждающие в тумане слепой веры. Упивающиеся насилием и зовущие кровожадность благочестием танцоры на нитях, под которыми раскинулась бездна скверны и падения. Чуть толкни их, и они полетят вниз... Ты бы мог{mf||ла} столкнуть их. О да".

{n}A ringing sound fills your ears, deafening the noise of the world around you. Time goes still. A voice {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whispers{/d} seductively in the back of your mind.{/n} "How interesting... Devout assassins who believe themselves to be instruments of a higher power. They revel in violence, and cannot tell the difference between bloodthirst and piety. They follow their faith blindly, unaware of how closely they tread to corruption and depravity. Look at them. They stand on the edge of a precipice. The smallest push will send them plummeting into the abyss. You could be their downfall. All you have to do... is push."
languages.original_text: {n}Звон в ушах оглушает вас на мгновение. Вы моргаете — и секунда тянется дольше декады лет. Волнующий обольстительный {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}шепот{/d} щекочет мозг изнутри:{/n} "Как интересно... Праведные убийцы, считающие себя орудием высшей воли, блуждающие в тумане слепой веры. Упивающиеся насилием и зовущие кровожадность благочестием танцоры на нитях, под которыми раскинулась бездна скверны и падения. Чуть толкни их, и они полетят вниз... Ты бы мог{mf||ла} столкнуть их. О да".

traits.locale_text: {n}A ringing in your ears deafens you for a second. You blink, and the second lasts more than a decade. A thrilling, seductive whisper is tickling your brain from the inside.{/n} "How interesting... Righteous assassins who believe themselves to be instruments of a higher will. Errant wanderers in the fog of a blind faith. Theirs is a bloodthirsty piety, an ecstasy of violence, as they dance on tightropes above an abyss of corruption and depravity. The smallest push will send them plummeting down... You could give them that push. You can."

You could give them that push. You can."

languages.text: {n}Un bourdonnement vous vrille les tympans et assourdit le bruit du monde qui vous entoure. Le temps semble comme suspendu. Une voix irrésistible se met à {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}chuchoter{/d} au fond de votre esprit.{/n} « Comme c'est intéressant... Des assassins dévoués persuadés d'être les instruments d'une puissance supérieure. Ils se délectent de la violence et sont bien incapables de faire la différence entre soif de sang et piété. Ils se contentent de suivre leur foi aveuglément, sans même se rendre compte que la corruption et la dépravation guettent à leur porte. Regardez-les. Ils se tiennent au bord d'un précipice. Une simple poussée les fera plonger dans l'abîme. Vous pourriez être à l'origine de leur chute. Il vous suffirait de... pousser. »
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing sound fills your ears, deafening the noise of the world around you. Time goes still. Ils se contentent de suivre leur foi aveuglément, sans même se rendre compte que la corruption et la dépravation guettent à leur porte. Regardez-les. Ils se tiennent au bord d'un précipice. Une simple poussée les fera plonger dans l'abîme. Vous pourriez être à l'origine de leur chute. Il vous suffirait de... pousser. »

languages.text: {n}Un zumbido llena tus oídos, ensordeciendo el mundo a tu alrededor. El tiempo se detiene. Una voz seductora {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}susurra{/d} en tu mente.{/n} «Qué interesante... Asesinos devotos que creen ser instrumentos de un poder superior. Disfrutan de la violencia y no ven ninguna diferencia entre la sed de sangre y la piedad. Siguen su fe a ciegas, sin saber lo cerca que están de la corrupción y la depravación. Míralos. Están en el borde del precipicio. Un leve empujón los enviará directos al abismo. Podrías ser su perdición. No tienes más que... empujar».
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing sound fills your ears, deafening the noise of the world around you. Time goes still. A voice {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whispers{/d} seductively in the back of your mind.{/n} "How interesting... Devout assassins who believe themselves to be instruments of a higher power. They revel in violence, and cannot tell the difference between bloodthirst and piety. They follow their faith blindly, unaware of how closely they tread to corruption and depravity. Look at them. They stand on the edge of a precipice. The smallest push will send them plummeting into the abyss. You could be their downfall. All you have to do... is push."

Disfrutan de la violencia y no ven ninguna diferencia entre la sed de sangre y la piedad. Siguen su fe a ciegas, sin saber lo cerca que están de la corrupción y la depravación. Míralos. Están en el borde del precipicio. Un leve empujón los enviará directos al abismo. Podrías ser su perdición. No tienes más que... empujar».

languages.text: {n}你的耳边突然传来了某个清脆的声音，盖过了周围的一切杂音。时间停止了，那个充满诱惑的声音在你的脑海中{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}低语{/d}起来。{/n}“多么有趣……这些虔诚的刺客，他们相信自己是某种更高层次的工具。他们沉迷于暴力，根本分不清虔诚与嗜血之间的区别。他们盲目地追随着信仰，却根本不知道他们自己离堕落、腐化有多近。看看他们吧，他们此刻就站在悬崖边上，只要轻轻地推一下，就能让他们堕入深渊。你可以为他们带来覆灭，而你要做的事情仅仅是……轻推一下。”
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing sound fills your ears, deafening the noise of the world around you. Time goes still. A voice {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whispers{/d} seductively in the back of your mind.{/n} "How interesting... Devout assassins who believe themselves to be instruments of a higher power. They revel in violence, and cannot tell the difference between bloodthirst and piety. They follow their faith blindly, unaware of how closely they tread to corruption and depravity. Look at them. They stand on the edge of a precipice. The smallest push will send them plummeting into the abyss. You could be their downfall. All you have to do... is push."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的耳边突然传来了某个清脆的声音，盖过了周围的一切杂音。时间停止了，那个充满诱惑的声音在你的脑海中{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}低语{/d}起来。{/n}“多么有趣……这些虔诚的刺客，他们相信自己是某种更高层次的工具。他们沉迷于暴力，根本分不清虔诚与嗜血之间的区别。他们盲目地追随着信仰，却根本不知道他们自己离堕落、腐化有多近。看看他们吧，他们此刻就站在悬崖边上，只要轻轻地推一下，就能让他们堕入深渊。你可以为他们带来覆灭，而你要做的事情仅仅是……轻推一下。”

languages.text: {n}鐘の音が耳を貫き、周囲の雑音が聞こえなくなった。時が静止した。あなたの頭の後ろで、魅惑的な声が{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}ささやかれた{/d}。{/n}「なんて興味深い…敬虔なアサシンたちは、自らを崇高な力の道具だと信じている。彼らは暴力を楽しみ、血の渇きと敬虔さの区別がつかない。彼らは盲目的に信仰に従うが、それがどれほど腐敗と堕落に近づいているかには気づいていない。彼らを見よ。彼らは崖っぷちに立っている。ほんの小さな一押しが、彼らを奈落の底へと突き落とす。あなたが彼らの破滅を招くかもしれない。あなたにもそれが可能です。そう、あなたがすべきことは…押すことだけです」
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing sound fills your ears, deafening the noise of the world around you. Time goes still. A voice {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whispers{/d} seductively in the back of your mind.{/n} "How interesting... Devout assassins who believe themselves to be instruments of a higher power. They revel in violence, and cannot tell the difference between bloodthirst and piety. They follow their faith blindly, unaware of how closely they tread to corruption and depravity. Look at them. They stand on the edge of a precipice. The smallest push will send them plummeting into the abyss. You could be their downfall. All you have to do... is push."

traits.locale_text: {n}鐘の音が耳を貫き、周囲の雑音が聞こえなくなった。時が静止した。あなたの頭の後ろで、魅惑的な声が{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}ささやかれた{/d}。{/n}「なんて興味深い…敬虔なアサシンたちは、自らを崇高な力の道具だと信じている。彼らは暴力を楽しみ、血の渇きと敬虔さの区別がつかない。彼らは盲目的に信仰に従うが、それがどれほど腐敗と堕落に近づいているかには気づいていない。彼らを見よ。彼らは崖っぷちに立っている。ほんの小さな一押しが、彼らを奈落の底へと突き落とす。あなたが彼らの破滅を招くかもしれない。あなたにもそれが可能です。そう、あなたがすべきことは…押すことだけです」

languages.text: {n}Ein durchdringendes Geräusch ertönt in deinen Ohren und betäubt den Lärm der Welt um dich herum. Die Zeit bleibt stehen. Du hörst in deinen Gedanken ein verführerisches {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}Flüstern{/d}.{/n} "Interessant ... Fromme Assassinen, die sich für die Instrumente einer höheren Macht halten. Sie suhlen sich in der Gewalt und kennen keinen Unterschied zwischen Blutrünstigkeit und Frömmigkeit. Sie folgen blind ihrem Glauben, ohne zu ahnen, wie nah sie der Grenze zur Verderbnis und Verkommenheit kommen. Seht sie Euch an. Sie stehen am Rand eines Abgrunds. Schon der kleinste Stoß würde sie in den Abyss stürzen. Ihr könntet ihr Niedergang sein. Ihr müsst sie nur ... schubsen."
languages.original_text: {n}A ringing sound fills your ears, deafening the noise of the world around you. Time goes still. A voice {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whispers{/d} seductively in the back of your mind.{/n} "How interesting... Devout assassins who believe themselves to be instruments of a higher power. They revel in violence, and cannot tell the difference between bloodthirst and piety. They follow their faith blindly, unaware of how closely they tread to corruption and depravity. Look at them. They stand on the edge of a precipice. The smallest push will send them plummeting into the abyss. You could be their downfall. All you have to do... is push."

Sie suhlen sich in der Gewalt und kennen keinen Unterschied zwischen Blutrünstigkeit und Frömmigkeit. Sie folgen blind ihrem Glauben, ohne zu ahnen, wie nah sie der Grenze zur Verderbnis und Verkommenheit kommen. Seht sie Euch an. Sie stehen am Rand eines Abgrunds. Schon der kleinste Stoß würde sie in den Abyss stürzen. Ihr könntet ihr Niedergang sein. Ihr müsst sie nur ... schubsen."

languages.text: {n}Kulakların çınlayıp çevrendeki hiçbir sesi duyamaz hâle getiriyor. Zaman akmaz oluyor. Zihninin gerisinden bir ses, kışkırtıcı bir şekilde {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}fısıldıyor{/d}.{/n} "Çok acayip... Yüce bir gücün elinde araç olduklarına inanan sadık suikastçılar. Asıl zevkleri şiddettir. Kana susamışlıkla dindarlık arasındaki farkı bilmezler. İnançlarına körü körüne bağlılar. Yozlaşma ve ahlaksızlığa ne kadar yakın olduklarının farkında değiller. Şu hâllerine bir bak. Uçurumun kenarındalar. En ufak bir hareketle dibini boylayabilirler. Düşmelerini sağlayabilirsin... Birazcık itsen yeter."

A voice {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}whispers{/d} seductively in the back of your mind.{/n} "How interesting... Devout assassins who believe themselves to be instruments of a higher power. They revel in violence, and cannot tell the difference between bloodthirst and piety. They follow their faith blindly, unaware of how closely they tread to corruption and depravity. Look at them. They stand on the edge of a precipice. The smallest push will send them plummeting into the abyss. You could be their downfall. All you have to do... is push."
